_sText:
I made this map during about 1 month and i put a lot of effort into it.
The map is probably very easy for seasoned players because i tried to make it possible for myself. Again, thanks to Dotty for being awsm and also thanks to EnD-Gaming for being a sick clan.

how to install : drag the map from the .rar on your desktop, go to SteamApps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps | drop the map in the maps folder have fun - vay.

Please comment and rate if you download. I wanna see some critics.
Have fun playing it, peace out!
